2025-05-07.title: Harvest Announces Filing of the Preliminary Prospectus for Harvest Apple Enhanced High Income Shares ETF
2025-05-07.description: OAKVILLE, Ontario — Harvest Portfolios Group Inc. (“Harvest”) is pleased to announce that it has filed a preliminary prospectus with the Canadian securities regulators for the Harvest Apple Enhanced High Income Shares ETF (“APLE”). APLE provides single-stock …

2025-05-07.title: Apple looks to add AI search to Safari in potential blow for Google | CNN Business
2025-05-07.description: Apple is “actively looking at” reshaping the Safari web browser on its devices to focus on AI-powered search engines, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, a move that could chip away at Google’s dominance in the lucrative search market.

2025-05-08.title: Apple Is Developing Specialized Chips for Glasses, New Macs and AI Servers
2025-05-08.description: Apple Inc.’s silicon design group is working on new chips that will serve as the brains for future devices, including its first smart glasses, more powerful Macs and artificial intelligence servers.

2025-05-08.title: From Apple to GM, Tariffs to Cost Companies Tens of Billions
2025-05-08.description: From Apple Inc. to General Motors Co., corporate America is bracing for tens of billions of dollars in damages from Trump’s trade war — and that’s before most affected goods have landed.
